heading: Self-Hosted & Cloud Options
description: Choose between self-hosted for full control or cloud for hassle-free scalability—tailor your CMS to fit your needs.

heading: Multi-Channel Content Delivery
description: Strapi enables multi-channel content delivery, allowing you to publish and manage content seamlessly across websites, mobile apps, IoT devices, and more.

heading: Enhanced Performance
description: Strapi offers enhanced performance with fast, optimized content delivery, ensuring a seamless user experience across all devices and platforms.

heading: Scalability
description: Strapi ensures scalability, allowing your content management system to grow effortlessly with your business needs, handling increasing traffic and content volume without compromise.

heading: Flexible Content Types
description: Strapi offers flexible content types, allowing you to create and manage structured content that fits your unique requirements and adapts to any project.

heading: API-First Approach
description: Strapi’s API-first approach enables seamless integration with any frontend, delivering content across multiple platforms and ensuring flexibility in development.

heading: Reusability
description: Strapi promotes content reusability, allowing you to create and manage content once, then reuse it across various platforms and channels, saving time and effort.

heading: Multilingual Support
description: Strapi offers multilingual support, enabling you to easily manage and deliver content in multiple languages, reaching a global audience with ease.

heading: Multiple Database Support
description: Strapi supports multiple databases, giving you the flexibility to choose the best database solution for your project, whether it's SQL or NoSQL.
